channel.title: Events on Konya Hackerspace
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Konya Hackerspace

item.title: NASA Space Apps Challenge 2025
item.description: In this event, two teams from Konya Hackerspace participated in NASA Space Apps Challenge 2025, building projects with NASA’s open data.

item.title: Hack101 #1
item.description: In this first guests-welcome event of Konya Hackerspace, Safa introduces us hacking, hacker culture and hackerspaces.

item.title: Make Your Own Badge #1
item.description: In this event Safa introduces 3d printing pipeline to us, from designing a model, to slicing, printing, adding accesories and troubleshooting it.
